author: Aydınlık
title: Ground News - Terrorists arrested in preparation for attacks on churches and synagogues
text:
Summary by Aydınlık In a joint operation of MİT and the Police, 32 suspects were arrested, three of whom were allegedly responsible for the attack on synagogues and churches in Turkey and the Iraqi Embassy in preparation for attacks on the Iraqi Embassy. Share menu More

Aydınlık Terrorists arrested in preparation for attacks on churches and synagogues In a joint operation of MİT and the Police, 32 suspects were arrested, three of whom were allegedly responsible for the attack on synagogues and churches in Turkey and the Iraqi Embassy in preparation for attacks on the Iraqi Embassy.
1 hour ago · Türkiye Read Full Article
Aydınlık
Terrorists arrested in preparation for attacks on churches and synagogues In a joint operation of MİT and the Police, 32 suspects were arrested, three of whom were allegedly responsible for the attack on synagogues and churches in Turkey and the Iraqi Embassy in preparation for attacks on the Iraqi Embassy.
